Dear Team,

 

It's that time again! Join us as we celebrate the birthdays of our UAE Country Management team members from January to April! ðŸŽ‚

This is the perfect moment to come together, enjoy some fun, and celebrate our amazing people.

 

You will be sent a separate email to inform us where you will be joining us from â€“ either HO1 or D3 canteenâ€”whichever is more convenient for you!

 

Please accept or decline the calendar invite to confirm your availability & attendance. 

 

We canâ€™t wait to celebrate with all of you!

 

Best regards,
